chest.name: Push-up
chest.instructions: Start in plank position, lower chest to floor, push back up.

chest.name: Barbell Bench Press
chest.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to chest, press back up.

biceps.name: Dumbbell Curl
biceps.instructions: Hold dumbbells, curl upward, control back down.

biceps.name: Barbell Curl
biceps.instructions: Hold barbell, curl upward, control back down.

abs.name: Plank
abs.instructions: Hold a push-up position with forearms on the ground.

abs.name: Crunch
abs.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, lift shoulders off ground.

lats.name: Pull-up
lats.instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin is above bar.

lats.name: Deadlift
lats.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at hips and knees to grasp barbell, lift by extending hips and knees to full stand.

triceps.name: Tricep Dip
triceps.instructions: Lower body by bending arms, push back up.

triceps.name: Tricep Pushdown
triceps.instructions: Push cable down by extending arms, control back up.

glutes.name: Glute squart
glutes.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, keep chest up and knees over toes, push through heels to return to standing position.

glutes.name: Hip Thrust
glutes.instructions: Sit on the ground with your upper back against a bench, roll a barbell over your hips, drive through your heels to lift your hips until your body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees, squeeze your glutes at the top, lower back down.

quads.name: bulgarian split squat
quads.instructions: Stand a few feet in front of a bench, place one foot on the bench behind you, lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, push through your front heel to return to standing.

quads.name: barbell highbar squat
quads.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, position a barbell on your upper traps, lower your body by bending at the hips and knees until your thighs are parallel to the ground, then push through your heels to return to standing.

shoulder.name: Elevated Pike Press
shoulder.instructions: Start in a downward dog position with your feet elevated on a bench or box, lower your head towards the ground by bending your elbows, then push back up to the starting position.

shoulder.name: dumbbell seated overhead press
shoulder.instructions: Sit on a bench with back support, hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended, then lower them back to shoulder height.

shoulder.name: male barbell overhead press
shoulder.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip, press the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended, then lower it back to shoulder height.

hamstrings.name: bodyweight glute bridge
hamstrings.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground, lift your hips towards the ceiling by squeezing your glutes, hold for a moment at the top, then lower back down.

hamstrings.name: Glute squart
hamstrings.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, keep chest up and knees over toes, push through heels to return to standing position.

traps.name: dumbbell shrug
traps.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, shrug your shoulders up towards your ears, hold for a moment, then lower back down.

traps.name: dumbbell seated shrug
traps.instructions: Sit on a bench with back support, hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides, shrug your shoulders up towards your ears, hold for a moment, then lower back down.

forearms.name: wrist curl
forearms.instructions: Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on your thighs, hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing up, curl your wrists upwards, hold for a moment, then lower back down.

forearms.name: reverse wrist curl
forearms.instructions: Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on your thighs, hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing down, curl your wrists upwards, hold for a moment, then lower back down.

lower back.name: Deadlift
lower back.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at hips and knees to grasp barbell, lift by extending hips and knees to full stand.

back middle.name: Pull-up
back middle.instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin is above bar.
